body_html: We have some TF code that basically adds support for CSR matrices in tensorflow, using cusparse and DT_VARIANT types. But we don't have a maintainer. I'm tempted to do this as a SIG and get some distributed maintenance help from e.g. external users & nvidia. @martinwicke @alextp wdyt?
body_text: We have some TF code that basically adds support for CSR matrices in tensorflow, using cusparse and DT_VARIANT types.  But we don't have a maintainer.  I'm tempted to do this as a SIG and get some distributed maintenance help from e.g. external users & nvidia.  @martinwicke @alextp wdyt?
body: We have some TF code that basically adds support for CSR matrices in tensorflow, using cusparse and DT_VARIANT types.  But we don't have a maintainer.  I'm tempted to do this as a SIG and get some distributed maintenance help from e.g. external users & nvidia.  @martinwicke @alextp wdyt?
